committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To amend title 14, United States Code, to require that the Coast Guard procure buoy chain manufactured in the United States.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to prohibit the Coast Guard from procuring buoy chain which is not manufactured in (or the components of which are not all substantially produced or manufactured in) the United States.

titles.title: To amend title 14, United States Code, to require that the Coast Guard procure buoy chain manufactured in the United States.
